howToPlay.label: How to Play
instructions: Guess the Danish word in 6 tries.
Each guess must be a valid 5-letter word.
After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.

FrontPage.title: Welcome to Ordle
FrontPage.description: Guess the Danish word in six tries or less! Rotates daily with a new word.

wordCard.title: Ordle
wordCard.description_1: 1. A delightful Danish twist on the classic Wordle game, where 'ord' means 'word' and every day brings a new linguistic challenge.
wordCard.description_2: 2. The daily ritual of guessing, celebrating, and sometimes lamenting your Danish vocabulary skills.
wordCard.usageExample: I got today's Ordle in three tries!
